vulnerabilities.name: Exported Activity
vulnerabilities.description: Activity is exported without proper protection, allowing other apps to launch it
vulnerabilities.remediation: Set exported=false or add proper permission/signature checks
vulnerabilities.source_code: <activity android:exported="true" android:name="owasp.sat.agoat.SplashActivity">

vulnerabilities.name: Exported Activity
vulnerabilities.description: Activity is exported without proper protection, allowing other apps to launch it
vulnerabilities.remediation: Set exported=false or add proper permission/signature checks
vulnerabilities.source_code: <activity android:exported="true" android:label="@string/activity" android:name="owasp.sat.agoat.AccessControl1ViewActivity">

vulnerabilities.name: Exported Service
vulnerabilities.description: Service is exported without protection, allowing unauthorized access
vulnerabilities.remediation: Set exported=false or add permission checks
vulnerabilities.source_code: <service android:enabled="true" android:exported="true" android:name="owasp.sat.agoat.DownloadInvoiceService"/>

vulnerabilities.name: Exported Broadcast Receiver
vulnerabilities.description: Broadcast receiver is exported, allowing any app to send broadcasts
vulnerabilities.remediation: Set exported=false or add permission filtering
vulnerabilities.source_code: <receiver android:enabled="true" android:exported="true" android:name="owasp.sat.agoat.ShowDataReceiver"/>

vulnerabilities.name: Exported Broadcast Receiver
vulnerabilities.description: Broadcast receiver is exported, allowing any app to send broadcasts
vulnerabilities.remediation: Set exported=false or add permission filtering
vulnerabilities.source_code: <receiver android:directBootAware="false" android:enabled="true" android:exported="true" android:name="androidx.profileinstaller.ProfileInstallReceiver" android:permission="android.permission.DUMP">

vulnerabilities.name: Exported Content Provider
vulnerabilities.description: Content Provider is exported without proper permission, exposing data
vulnerabilities.remediation: Use proper URI permission checking or disable export
vulnerabilities.source_code: <provider android:authorities="owasp.sat.agoat.provider.userpinsprovider" android:exported="true" android:name="owasp.sat.agoat.ContentProviderActivity"/>
